home.title: AIDE+ | Discover all the benefits you're entitled to in France

simulation.title: Discover your benefits in 5 minutes

simulation.cardDescription: Select your region to start the free simulation.
simulation.note: Your data is anonymous and secure

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about AIDE+.
faq.a1: Basic simulation is completely free. To access unlimited AI assistant and advanced features, check out our Premium plans.
faq.a2: Absolutely. All your data is encrypted and securely stored. We never share your information with third parties.
faq.a3: Answer a few questions about your situation (age, status, income...) and our algorithm automatically calculates the benefits you're eligible for.
faq.q4: Can I use AIDE+ if I don't speak French?
faq.a4: Yes! AIDE+ is available in French and English. You can change the language at any time.
faq.a5: You can contact us via the Contact page or directly by email. Premium users get priority support.
faq.q6: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a6: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription at any time. You'll keep access until the end of your billing period.

pricing.label: Pricing
pricing.title: Choose your plan
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade to Premium whenever you want.

footer.description: AIDE+ supports you in your administrative procedures in France.
